summary: This Mod add some Speaking Animals :D
descriptionHtml:
NOTE! This Mod is in a early stage, that means it is not a big mod yet, and it is not near finnished.... i think i have completed like 0.5% of the mod ;)
Who doesnt want some talking Animals in to the game?
if you want this is the perfect mod for you!
this mod is under heavy development and i will update this mod often!! :D
i want this mod to Become a huge mod!!, hope you like it :)
Leave a comment if you want ;D
READ THIS: I will Update this mod to version 0.0.3 when i have time to finnish the update.. my school has started so i does not have so much time :/

But remeber fellas, this mod i only a BETA!! if you find something like total badass report it to me, so i can fix it.. i am not sure if you guys find it unstable, but as far as i can see it works perfectly ;D Hope you like this!!

i will post this in the comment section too! ;)

The Animals are located outsie riverwood and solitude, the rest of the animals you must find by your selfe, i have now released three animals :)
How to Install: Just download with NMM and activate it
or if you do it manualy ju must add the .esp file in your Skyrim Data Folder!! :)
What you will see in the next update: A new Dragon called Ahkrin, it means Courage, on Dragon Language! 
Please Report BUGS! ;)

--UPDATES--
Version 0.0.2
-Added A new animal, called Mickey the Skeever
-Fixed some small bugs.
author: VenuHD
